snippet: The company's strategy of shedding under-performing assets and focusing on content was paying off, according to its chief executive, Jeffrey L. Bewkes.
abstract: The company's strategy of shedding under-performing assets and focusing on content was paying off, according to its chief executive, Jeffrey L. Bewkes.

headline.main: Cable TV and Movie Divisions Help Lift Time Warner Revenue
headline.print_headline: Time Warner Revenue Climbs 5% to $8.2 Billion
